data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc,
rw add_comm b c,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_assoc,
rw ← mul_succ,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_comm,
rw add_comm (a * d) a,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,

rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_assoc (a * d) a,
rw add_comm a (b * d + b),
rw add_assoc (b * d) b,
rw add_comm b a,
rw add_assoc (a * d) (b * d),
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_mul,
refl,

rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
rw mul_comm,
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_comm a c,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw succ_mul,
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,

refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw pow_zero,
refl,

rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,

rw add_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_assoc (a ^ m) (a ^ d),
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,

rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_comm a (b^d * b),
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_comm b a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw pow_zero,
refl,

rw pow_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw pow_add,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,

rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
rw ← one_eq_succ_zero,
rw ← two_eq_succ_one,

induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hd,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw succ_mul,
rw succ_mul,
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,
simp,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
simp,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact n,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
have j : Q → R := f p,
apply f,
exact p,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply h,
apply f,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply h,
apply f,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro f16,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
apply f16,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:

have u := l(t),
exact u,

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)

(i : Q → R)

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
intro b,
intro c,

apply a,
exact c,

apply b,
exact c,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
intro q,
intro p,

apply q,
apply h,
apply p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intro h,
intro q,
intro p,

apply q,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText: cc,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
intro j,
cases h with p q,
cases j with q r,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,

intro j,
cases j with hqr hrq,

split,
intro p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

intro r,
apply hqp,
apply hrq,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,

intro j,
cases j with hqr hrq,

split,
intro p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

intro r,
apply hqp,
apply hrq,
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
right,
exact p,

left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
cases h with p qr,
cases qr with q r,

left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,

right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

intro j,
split,
cases j with pq pr,
cases pq with p q,
exact p,

cases pr with p r,
exact p,

cases j with pq pr,
cases pq with p q,
left,
exact q,

cases pr with p r,
right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro pnp,
cases pnp with p np,
rw not_iff_imp_false at np,
exfalso,
apply np,
apply p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
exact hs,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
apply succ_inj,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw h,
cc,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,

intro h,
rw h,
cc,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with d,
rw add_zero at h,
rw add_zero at h,
exact h,

rw add_succ at h,
rw add_succ at h,
have j :=  t_ih(succ_inj(h)),
exact j,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw add_comm at h,
rw add_comm t b at h,

exact add_right_cancel a t b(h),

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
exact add_right_cancel a t b (h),

intro h,
rw h,
cc,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw ← add_zero a at h,
rw add_assoc at h,
rw zero_add at h,

exact add_left_cancel a b 0(h),

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b,
cc,

rw add_succ at H,
have j := succ_ne_zero (a+b) H,
exfalso,
exact j,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm,
apply add_left_eq_zero,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw ← add_one_eq_succ at h,
symmetry at h,
have c := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self(h),
rw one_eq_succ_zero at c,
have d := succ_ne_zero 0 (c),
exact d,

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
intro h,

induction b with d hd,
rw mul_zero at h,
exact q(h),

rw mul_succ at h,
have c := add_left_eq_zero(h),
exact p(c),

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases a,

left,
refl,

right,
rw succ_mul at h,
have j := add_left_eq_zero (h),
exact j,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,

revert a b,
exact eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero,

intro p,
cases p,

rw p,
rw zero_mul,
refl,

rw p,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd generalizing b,

intro p,
rw mul_zero at p,
have q := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b,
have c := q(p),
cases c,

have d := ha(c),
exfalso,
exact d,

exact c,

induction b with e he,

rw mul_zero,
intro q,
symmetry at q,
have c := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a (succ d) (q),
cases c,

exfalso,
exact ha(c),

symmetry at c,
exact c,

intro p,
have q := hd e,
rw mul_succ at p,
rw mul_succ at p,
have r := add_right_cancel (a * e) a (a * d) p,
have s := q(r),
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq(s),
